description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Patumba makes saving and investing simple, accessible, and impactful. Whether you’re planning for a rainy day, securing your child’s education, or preparing for retirement, the app is designed to grow with you.

Here’s why so many choose Patumba:

It’s flexible: Start small with as little as K1 or invest more as your goals evolve.
It’s inclusive: Everyone can join, thanks to mobile money and card payment options.
It’s empowering: Track your progress, set goals, and celebrate milestones—all within the app.
It’s simple: The intuitive design makes saving and investing effortless for everyone.
Patumba builds on the convenience of familiar mobile services, delivering even more through the app:

Get Started: Download the app, sign up in minutes, and explore your options.
Top Up Your Wallet: Deposit funds using mobile money or card, making it accessible to all users.
Choose Your Plan: Whether it’s short-term savings or goal-specific plans like education or retirement, Patumba has something for everyone.
Track Your Growth: Watch your savings and investments flourish with real-time updates and easy-to-read dashboards.
Features

Round-Up Savings: Automatically save your spare change and grow your wealth effortlessly.
Customizable Goals: Set financial targets that align with your dreams, and let Patumba keep you on track.
Multi-Channel Support: Need help? Access our 24/7 in-app customer support or engage with us on social media.

The FNB Banking App embraces the future of help and our new look and feel will do just that 
Some features to look out for: 

Simple straight-forward navigation – We’ve added bottom navigation to make it easier to find what you need, when you need it. 
Switch users easily – Multiple profiles?  No problem!  Switch seamlessly between different user profiles by selecting profiles located on the bottom navigation and then select “switch user”. 
Introducing the Action Panel – Bringing your banking features front and center, like payments, transfers, my cards, and cash withdrawals. 
Chat Pay – A revolutionary new feature called Chat Pay that allows you to pay any FNB customer via a simple chat, all within FNB’s secure ecosystem giving you peace of mind that the person you are paying has been verified and approved.  It’s that simple. 

What is Pay? 
We have renamed Payments to Pay.  This feature will provide you with access to categories within payments such as pay, receive, pay bills, payment settings, and payment history. 

What is Secure Messaging? 
Chat to other FNB/RMB customers securely on the App by granting access to your contact list.  Features within Secure Messaging include Chat Pay, voice notes, attachments, share location, etc.

Lupiya is a pioneering neobank based in Zambia, dedicated to providing accessible and inclusive financial services. Our primary goal is to empower individuals and small businesses through flexible and transparent lending solutions.
 
Why Choose Lupiya?
Flexible Loan Amounts: Borrow amounts suited to your needs, from small personal loans to larger business financing.
Convenient Repayment Plans: Repayment periods range from 60 days to 60 months, offering flexibility to suit your financial situation.
No Collateral Needed: Access loans without the need for physical collateral.
Transparent Fees: No hidden fees, no rollover charges, and no transaction fees.
Build Your Credit: Timely repayments and increased limit tasks help build your credit limit and reduce future interest rates.
Loan Features:
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): Ranges from 24% to 56%, depending on loan terms and borrower profile.
Example: Borrow ZMW 100,000 over 6 months with an interest rate of 4% per month, totaling ZMW 124,000 repayment.
Example Loan Calculation:
Borrowed Amount: ZMW 100,000
Loan Term: 6 months
Interest Rate: 4% per month
Total Interest: 24% for 6 months
Total Repayment: ZMW 124,000
How to Get a Loan:
Download and Register: Get our app and create an account.
Fill Out Basic Information: Complete the application with necessary details.
Apply for a Loan: Submit your application online for quick approval.
Receive Funds: Approved loans are disbursed directly into your bank account.
Eligibility Requirements:
Residency: Must be a resident of Zambia.
Age: Applicants must be between 18 and 60 years old.
Contact Us:For more information, questions, or suggestions, our team is available to assist you.
Service Hotline: +260761167020
(Available from 8 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday, and 8 AM to 1 PM on Saturdays)
Email: info@lupiya.com
Office Address: Counting House Unit 1, Suite 1, along Thabo Mbeki Road , Lusaka, Zambia
Stay connected with us on social media:
Facebook: https://web.facebook.com/Lupiyaloans/?_rdc=1&_rdr
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lupiya/
Check us out here: https://www.lupiya.com/

TRADING

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Fast, transparent personal loans for UAE residents 
 
CashNow lets you secure an instant loan straight from your phone. Our simple 5-step application process can be completed in under five minutes and you can receive funds in their bank account within minutes after approval. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

What makes CashNow stand out? 

Real speed – apply, get a decision, and get approved - on the same day. 

Fixed, easy pricing – AED 150 processing fee plus a flat 6 % interest for the full three-month term. No hidden extra charges. 

Licensed & regulated – CashNow (Quantix Technologies) is licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE 

Paper-free – just your Emirates ID and basic details; no credit documents or bank documents 

Full control – track disbursement, repayment dates, and loan balance inside the app. 

Data security – Your personal information is safe with us.  

Options for everyone: We have variety of lending options from small loans starting from AED 100 to upto AED 30,000. Your repayment history and your credit behaviour can unlock various limits for you.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Simple cost example 
 

You choose to borrow AED 1,500 at a 3 month tenure:  
→ we deposit AED 1,350 in your account after deducting the AED 150 fee 
→ repay AED 530 each month for three months (total AED 1,590) 

Your repayment amount is fixed on day one—no surprises later. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Eligibility 

→ UAE residents aged 20 – 55 
→ Valid Emirates ID 
→ Regular monthly income 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

How to get your quick loan 

→ Download & install CashNow (it’s free). 
→ Sign up and KYC with Emirates ID  
→ Choose how much you need.  
→ Submit—fill out some basic details and submit. You get a near instant decision on your application 

Receive the money in your bank account if approved, usually within minutes. 
 

That’s it—no branch visits, no paperwork. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ 

Is CashNow safe? 
Yes. We are a licensed and regulated entity by Central Bank of UAE and comply with all UAE lending regulations. 

Can I repay early? 
Absolutely. Early settlement is allowed at any time with a small fee.  

What if I’m declined? 
Our risk algorithm updates frequently so make sure to keep applying every few days!! 
Your application status will not reflect your credit score. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Download CashNow today and solve your cash needs—fast, fair, and fully transparent. 

*T&C Apply

description:
Your money, your way

Easily track your finances, discover tools and features to help you manage your money, and explore personalised offers – all at your fingertips.

Effortless day-to-day banking

• Quick payments and transfers: Send money with ease
• Top up instantly: Buy airtime, data, SMS bundles, and electricity
• Send money vouchers: Share cash vouchers to anyone with a cellphone
• Hassle-free international payments: Make global transactions in just a few taps
• Play Lotto: Try your luck directly from the app

Take control of your money

• Open a savings account online: Start saving in minutes
• Manage your cards: Set payment limits, stop or replace cards quickly
• Access documents on-demand: Get stamped statements, bank letters and tax certificates
• Quick balance checks: View your balances without signing in
• Track insurance claims: Submit and monitor your building insurance claims easily

Everything you need, all in one place

• One view of all your accounts: See all your Standard Bank accounts in one convenient place
• Manage your loans: Handle your personal, vehicle and home loans with ease
• Get vehicle loan pre-approval: Apply for pre-approval in just a few taps
• Link your accounts to trading: Manage your share trading profile directly from the app
• Monitor your investments: View your Stanlib investments anytime, anywhere

Note: Availability of some features may vary depending on your region.

Your app will automatically update to ensure you always have the latest features and security upgrades.

Getting started

Simply download the app using data (charges apply for the initial download), but once you’re set-up, there are no data charges when using the app. As long as you have a connection, your banking is ready to go!

Transactional features are available to Standard Bank accounts held in South Africa, Ghana, Uganda, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Tanzania, Lesotho, Malawi, eSwatini and Namibia. Keep in mind that some types of payments include transaction fees.  

Legal info  

The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act; and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.  

Stanbic Bank Botswana Limited is a Company (registration number: 1991/1343) incorporated in the Republic of Botswana and a registered commercial bank. Namibia: Standard Bank is a licensed banking institution in terms of the Banking Institutions Act, registration number 78/01799. Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited is regulated by the Bank of Uganda.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 4 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 4 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.
